sqlMap.select: SELECT USER_ID,USER_NAME,GRP_ISS_CD FROM ( SELECT A.USER_ID,USER_NAME,ROWNUM GRP_ISS_CD FROM GIIS_USERS A,GIIS_USER_GRP_HDR B WHERE A.USER_GRP = B.USER_GRP AND (B.USER_GRP_DESC LIKE '%ISSUA%' OR MIS_SW ='Y') ORDER BY A.USER_ID )
SELECT USER_NAME FROM GIIS_USERS WHERE USER_ID = #value#
SELECT assd_no FROM gipi_polbasic WHERE POLICY_ID = #value#
SELECT sys_context('USERENV','DB_NAME') AS Instance FROM dual

SELECT distinct a.tran_cd,a.line_cd,a.iss_cd FROM giis_user_grp_line a, giis_users b,giis_user_grp_dtl c WHERE a.user_grp = b.user_grp AND a.user_grp = c.user_grp AND a.tran_cd = c.tran_cd AND b.user_id = #value# UNION ALL SELECT distinct a.tran_cd,a.line_cd,a.iss_cd FROM giis_user_line a,giis_user_iss_cd b WHERE a.USERID = #value# AND b.USERID = a.USERID AND b.ISS_CD = a.ISS_CD AND b.TRAN_CD = a.TRAN_CD ORDER BY 1

SELECT distinct a.tran_cd FROM giis_user_grp_line a, giis_users b,giis_user_grp_dtl c WHERE a.user_grp = b.user_grp AND a.user_grp = c.user_grp AND a.tran_cd = c.tran_cd AND b.user_id = #value# UNION ALL SELECT distinct a.tran_cd FROM giis_user_line a,giis_user_iss_cd b WHERE a.USERID = #value# AND b.USERID = a.USERID AND b.ISS_CD = a.ISS_CD AND b.TRAN_CD = a.TRAN_CD ORDER BY 1

SELECT distinct a.line_cd line_cd FROM giis_user_line a,giis_user_iss_cd b WHERE a.USERID = #userId# AND b.USERID = a.USERID AND b.ISS_CD = a.ISS_CD AND b.TRAN_CD = a.TRAN_CD AND a.tran_cd = #tranCd# UNION ALL SELECT distinct a.line_cd line_cd FROM giis_user_grp_line a, giis_users b,giis_user_grp_dtl c WHERE a.user_grp = b.user_grp AND a.user_grp = c.user_grp AND a.tran_cd = c.tran_cd AND b.user_id = #userId# AND a.tran_cd = #tranCd# ORDER BY 1

SELECT distinct a.iss_cd iss_cd FROM giis_user_grp_line a, giis_users b,giis_user_grp_dtl c WHERE a.user_grp = b.user_grp AND a.user_grp = c.user_grp AND a.tran_cd = c.tran_cd AND b.user_id = #userId# AND a.tran_cd = #tranCd# UNION ALL SELECT distinct a.iss_cd iss_cd FROM giis_user_line a,giis_user_iss_cd b WHERE a.USERID = #userId# AND b.USERID = a.USERID AND b.ISS_CD = a.ISS_CD AND b.TRAN_CD = a.TRAN_CD AND a.tran_cd = #tranCd# ORDER BY 1

SELECT module_id FROM GIIS_USER_MODULES WHERE USERID = #userId# AND ACCESS_TAG = '1' UNION ALL SELECT module_id FROM GIIS_USER_GRP_MODULES WHERE USER_GRP IN(SELECT USER_GRP FROM GIIS_USERS WHERE USER_ID = #userId#) AND ACCESS_TAG = '1'

SELECT cashiers.user_id , gu.user_name , gu.user_grp grp_iss_cd FROM ( SELECT user_id FROM giac_order_of_payts GROUP BY user_id UNION SELECT user_id FROM giac_spoiled_or GROUP BY user_id UNION SELECT a.user_id FROM giac_comm_voucher_ext a WHERE print_tag = 'P' GROUP BY user_id UNION SELECT gcd.user_id FROM giac_chk_disbursement gcd , giac_acctrans gc WHERE check_stat = 2 AND gcd.gacc_tran_id= gc.tran_id GROUP BY gcd.user_id UNION SELECT gcd.user_id FROM giac_chk_disbursement gcd , giac_acctrans gc WHERE check_stat = 3 AND gcd.gacc_tran_id= gc.tran_id GROUP BY gcd.user_id UNION SELECT rcd.user_id FROM request_check_det rcd WHERE rcd.req_printed = 'P' GROUP BY rcd.user_id UNION SELECT rcd.user_id FROM request_check_det rcd WHERE rcd.req_printed = 'S' GROUP BY rcd.user_id ) cashiers, giis_users gu, giis_user_grp_hdr gp WHERE cashiers.user_id = gu.user_id AND gu.user_grp = gp.user_grp AND gu.active_flag = 'Y' GROUP BY cashiers.user_id , gu.user_name , gu.user_grp ORDER BY cashiers.user_id
